content.description:
Start off boulders 5 feet right of

Stemski

and make crimpy moves to gain a large, incut hueco; starting up Stemksi and cutting over makes the start 5.8 or so.

Mantle the hueco and continue up the juggy face, almost joining Jeepers Leepers at the horizontal, and then cut left up a seam past an intrusion to finish with some thin moves up a smooth section of face.

Fun moves on good rock make this worth doing if in the area. Two stars out of five.
content.location:
The left side of the featured face with

Jeepers Leepers

.

content.description: Stem and jam your way up cracks in a corner at the left end of the wall. This route has some of the best quality rock on the wall. Descend by rapping the route.
content.protection: Gear to 3 inches, 2 bolt anchor/rap (1/2" SS)

content.description:
This is the crack just right of

Jeepers Leepers

.

content.protection:
8 bolts, bolted anchor/rap, maybe a sling near the top for pro

All bolts have been replaced and are 3/8" SS or 1/2" SS.

content.description: Start up the left-facing elongated "flake" about 4 ft to the right of Indian Garden.  Surmount a steep bulge and follow 2 bolts up to a thin vertical crevice that leads to the same ledge that Indian Garden tops out on.  Could stop there and step over to the bolted rap chains atop Mother Board Breakdown, or continue to summit via either a right curving crack or the face to the right passing one more bolt.  Rated PG/R in Bartlett's Rock Climbs of Pinto Basin.
content.protection: Small to medium pro, plus 2 bolts, or an additional 3rd bolt to lead up to the summit.
content.location: Rap using bolted rap chains atop MBB.

content.protection: 2 bolts (1/2", 3/8"), pro to 2.5", 2 bolt anchor/rap (shared with Stemski)
content.location:
This route climbs the right edge of the huecoed face right of

Stemski

past two widely spaced bolts.

content.description: Roughly equal difficulty as Stemsky though much less stemming. Mostly jamming and face holds with crack for protection.
content.protection: Build an anchor at the top.
content.location:
Crack is just to the right of the crack

My Three Friends

.
